definition[0]: a recording containing an example of someone’s music that is sent to a record company so that they can decide whether to produce it or not
definition[1]: an event at which a large group of people publicly protest about something
definition[2]: an explanation of how something works
definition[3]: an example of a product that is used to show what it is like or how it works
example[2]: demo homes on the new development
definition[4]: a computer program that shows what a new piece of software will be able to do when it is ready to be sold
example[3]: Click here to download a demo of the new version of our personal finance software.
definition[5]: to show or explain how something works or is done, especially new computer equipment
example[4]: They’re going to demo some of the new software at this year’s Mac convention.
definition[6]: a computer program that shows customers what a new piece of software will be able to do when it is ready to be sold, to encourage them to buy the complete form of the software
